long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Makes Addicting Sites Painful to Use. Break your social media addiction. 

Created by @Msitver from Letterjoy.co

Features:
- Remove images, videos, or color
- Require affirmative consent every [x] minutes
- Require affirmative consent after scrolling 1000px
- And more...

More specifics:

Scroll alerts: Get warnings when you mindlessly scroll.

Ugly Design tweaks: Remove color, images, or video, and make fonts smaller and uglier.
Annoying prompts: Clicking "cancel" redirects you to a random wikipedia page.
Sassy reminders: Guilt yourself into being productive.
